description: The Rev. Federico Lombardi, the Vatican's spokesman, described plans for Pope Francis to meet Patriarch Kirill of the Russian Orthodox Church in Cuba on Feb. 12.
title: Vatican Announces Meeting With Russian Patriarch
title_page: Vatican Announces Meeting With Russian Patriarch - Video - NYTimes.com
text: The Rev. Federico Lombardi, the Vatican's spokesman, described plans for Pope Francis to meet Patriarch Kirill of the Russian Orthodox Church in Cuba on Feb. 12.
